name: Boxiz
description:
Boxiz is the ultimate game for gamers, fans, and anyone looking for a chance to win. It's completely free to play and you can win Boxiz coins, cash, bonus boxes and other great prizes every time you enter. It's a fun and easy gaming experience where everyone can play and anyone can win! Join our community of playerz and discover the game inside the game.

Already have an account? Log in with your existing Boxiz account and play now!


AMAZING PRIZES & GIVEAWAYS

Playerz can win Boxiz coins, cash, gift cards, products and a lot more. Special prize announcements and giveaways are delivered to our gamers on social media @playboxiz, discord and via email. Prizes for each contest and how you can win them, can be found in the contest details. Prizes may vary based on contest, promotion, sponsor, etc.

ENTER, MATCH AND WIN

Enter the game you want to play and pick your favorite box. Once the game begins your box will reveal your numbers. All you have to do is have your numbers match the last digit of the game score and you win! There are also bonus boxes and lucky boxes hidden in certain games. Unlock those boxes to win even more prizes!

EARN POINTS TO LEVEL UP

The more you play, the more player points you accumulate. The more points you have the more you can level up. The more you level up, the more free bonus boxes you receive. Bonus boxes contain Boxiz coins, cash and other special prizes provided by Boxiz and other select sponsors. 

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Create your own contest and invite your friends to join for their chance to win. It's easy to create, manage, share and see who wins. For every contest created, Boxiz will provide a special prize hidden in each game. Share and play with your friends and followers today!

MORE

Boxiz games are available for all major sports and esports and there is a lot more to come very soon. Please let us know if you are enjoying your experience or would like to see any specific updates in the future. We hope you have a great time playing and we look forward to your feedback.

HAVE FUN AND GOOD LUCK! IT'S ANYONE'S GAME!
